title: Process Corporate ACH Payment File
description: A corporate client's treasury department needs to process a payroll file via ACH.

tasks.description: Receive and validate the format of the ACH payment file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the file format is correct and all required fields are present.

tasks.description: Check the corporate account for sufficient funds to cover the total payroll amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the account balance is sufficient.

tasks.description: Schedule the ACH batch for processing on the specified settlement date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the payment batch and provides a confirmation ID.
